text: HBO Max’s new TV and movie release schedule for March 17 to March 23, 2025, includes House of Knives Season 1, Sing Sing, Tiny Toons Looniversity Season 2C, Girl Meets Farm Season 14, and others. On March 19, House of Knives Season 1 drops on HBO Max. The reality show focuses on chefs engaging in interesting and thrilling challenges. While they give in all their efforts to nail every task, the path towards victory gets tougher with time. Further, the prison drama Sing Sing will be available on the streaming platform. It is based on the real-life story of a man falsely kept at Sing Sing prison. However, his life takes an interesting turn when he decides to stage an original comedy with a theater group of other prisoners. Also coming out on HBO Max is Tiny Toons Looniversity Season 2C. The cartoon series focuses on the lives of Buster, Babs, and their friends. They decide to join the central institution for hijinx known as Acme Looniversity. Thus begins a series of hilarious and dramatic adventures turning everyone’s lives upside down. Later, Girl Meets Farm Season 14 releases on the streaming platform. The series focuses on Molly Yeh, a food blogger, as she prepares numerous dishes, reflecting her love for cooking. Additionally, she takes viewers on a surreal journey by unfolding her lifestyle in a village. New HBO Max releases for March 17 – March 23 2025 Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to HBO Max from March 17 – March 23, 2025. March 17 A Body in the Snow: The Trial of Karen Read, Season 1 (ID) TNT Sports Conversations, Season 1 (TNT Sports) March 19 House of Knives, Season 1 (Food Network) March 21 A Decent Man (Porządny Człowiek), Season 1 (HBO Original) Sing Sing (A24) March 22 Tiny Toons Looniversity, Season 2C (Cartoon Network) March 23 Girl Meets Farm, Season 14 (Food Network) For more HBO Max content, find out the reason behind The Righteous Gemstones ending after Season 4. Also, here is the trailer for The Last of Us Season 2.
html:
HBO Max’s new TV and movie release schedule for March 17 to March 23, 2025, includes House of Knives Season 1, Sing Sing, Tiny Toons Looniversity Season 2C, Girl Meets Farm Season 14, and others.

On March 19, House of Knives Season 1 drops on HBO Max. The reality show focuses on chefs engaging in interesting and thrilling challenges. While they give in all their efforts to nail every task, the path towards victory gets tougher with time.

Further, the prison drama Sing Sing will be available on the streaming platform. It is based on the real-life story of a man falsely kept at Sing Sing prison. However, his life takes an interesting turn when he decides to stage an original comedy with a theater group of other prisoners.

Also coming out on HBO Max is Tiny Toons Looniversity Season 2C. The cartoon series focuses on the lives of Buster, Babs, and their friends. They decide to join the central institution for hijinx known as Acme Looniversity. Thus begins a series of hilarious and dramatic adventures turning everyone’s lives upside down.

Later, Girl Meets Farm Season 14 releases on the streaming platform. The series focuses on Molly Yeh, a food blogger, as she prepares numerous dishes, reflecting her love for cooking. Additionally, she takes viewers on a surreal journey by unfolding her lifestyle in a village.

New HBO Max releases for March 17 – March 23 2025

Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to HBO Max from March 17 – March 23, 2025.

March 17

  • A Body in the Snow: The Trial of Karen Read, Season 1 (ID)
  • TNT Sports Conversations, Season 1 (TNT Sports)

March 19

  • House of Knives, Season 1 (Food Network)

March 21

  • A Decent Man (Porządny Człowiek), Season 1 (HBO Original)
  • Sing Sing (A24)

March 22

  • Tiny Toons Looniversity, Season 2C (Cartoon Network)

March 23

  • Girl Meets Farm, Season 14 (Food Network)

For more HBO Max content, find out the reason behind The Righteous Gemstones ending after Season 4. Also, here is the trailer for The Last of Us Season 2.
